description: This table contains the core information reported to the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) for each registry record. This table also contains information that can be used to monitor the UNOS reporting process and obtain related statistics.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: UNOS_REC_KEY
columns.description: The unique record key given to the form by UNOS.

columns.name: UNOS_ORGAN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of organ transplanted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Lung


Pancreas


Liver


Kidney


Kidney/Pancreas


Intestine


Heart


Heart/Lung


Pancreas Islets

columns.name: UNOS_PAT_FIRST_NAME
columns.description: The patient's first name.

columns.name: UNOS_PAT_LAST_NAME
columns.description: The patient's last name.

columns.name: UNOS_PAT_MIDDLE_INI
columns.description: The patient's middle initial.

columns.name: UNOS_HIC
columns.description: The patient's Health Insurance Commission Number.

columns.name: UNOS_DOB_DT
columns.description: The patient's date of birth.

columns.name: UNOS_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the UNOS-imported sex. This is the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Male


Female

columns.name: UNOS_PAT_KEY
columns.description: The transplant center ID issued to the patient by UNOS.

columns.name: UNOS_TXP_DT
columns.description: The date of the patient's transplant operation.

columns.name: UNOS_RCPT_CTR_CODE
columns.description: The code used by UNOS to identify the facility at which the transplant operation took place.

columns.name: UNOS_RCPT_CTR_TYPE
columns.description: The type of facility at which the transplant operation took place.

columns.name: UNOS_FOL_CTR_CODE
columns.description: The code used by UNOS to identify the facility responsible for the patient's follow-up care.

columns.name: UNOS_FOL_CTR_TYPE
columns.description: The type of facility responsible for the patient's follow-up care.

columns.name: UNOS_DONORID
columns.description: The transplant center ID issued to the donor by UNOS.

columns.name: UNOS_DONOR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of donor: living or deceased.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Deceased


Living

columns.name: UNOS_TRR_KEY
columns.description: The patient's Transplant Recipient Registration ID.

columns.name: UNOS_FORM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The form status of the follow-up form sent to UNOS. It  should be one of these values: ID                 Value 1	Amnesty 2	Expected 3	Returned 4	Received 5	Suspended 6	Validated


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Amnesty


Expected


Returned


Received


Suspended


Validated

columns.name: UNOS_ADD_DT
columns.description: The date on which the UNOS follow-up form was created.

columns.name: UNOS_CHANGE_DT
columns.description: The date on which the UNOS follow-up form was changed.

columns.name: UNOS_FOL_PROV_NUM
columns.description: The NPI of the provider responsible for the patient's follow-up care.

columns.name: UNOS_GRAFT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The graft's status: functioning or failed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Functioning


Failed

columns.name: UNOS_GRAFT_FAIL_DT
columns.description: The date of the graft's failure.

columns.name: UNOS_FOL_UP_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The follow-up code assigned to the encounter.  Follow-up code indicates the period of time on which a form is reporting.

6 month


1 year

5 year after graft failure

columns.name: UNOS_TXP_DSCH_DT
columns.description: The date on which the patient was discharged after the transplant operation.

columns.name: PHYS_NAME
columns.description: The name of the physician who last saw the patient.

columns.name: NPI
columns.description: The NPI of the physician who last saw the patient.

columns.name: UNOS_HEIGHT
columns.description: The patient's height in centimeters.

columns.name: UNOS_HEIGHT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The code specifying why the patient's height is empty.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


N/A


Not Done


Missing


Unknown

columns.name: UNOS_WEIGHT
columns.description: The patient's weight in kilograms.

columns.name: UNOS_WEIGHT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The code specifying why the patient's weight is empty.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNOS_HEIGHT_STAT_C_NAME

columns.name: PAT_STATUS_DT
columns.description: The date for the most recent of the following events: patient last seen, organ retransplanted, or patient's death.

columns.name: PAT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's status: living, dead, or retransplanted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Living


Dead


Not Seen


Retransplanted


Lost


Natural Disaster

columns.name: UNOS_FUNC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's functional status as reported to UNOS.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Performs activities of daily living with NO assistance


Performs activities of daily living with SOME assistance


Performs activities of daily living with TOTAL assistance


Not Applicable (Patient Less Than 1 Year Old)


Unknown


10% - Moribund, Fatal Processes Progressing Rapidly


20% - Very Sick, Hospitalization Necessary: Active Treatment Necessary


30% - Severely Disabled: Hospitalization is Indicated, Death Not Imminent


40% - Disabled: Requires Special Care and Assistance


50% - Requires Considerable Assistance and Frequent Medical Care


60% - Requires Occasional Assistance but is Able to Care for Needs


70% - Cares for Self: Unable to Carry on Normal Activity or Active Work


80% - Normal Activity with Effort: Some Symptoms of Disease


90% - Able to Carry on Normal Activity: Minor Symptoms of Disease


100% - Normal, No Complaints, No Evidence of Disease


10% - No Play; Does Not Get out of Bed


20% - Often Sleeping; Play Entirely Limited to Very Passive Activities


30% - In Bed; Needs Assistance Even for Quiet Play


40% - Mostly in Bed, Participates in Quiet Activities


50% - Can Dress but Lies Around Much of Day; No Active Play; Quiet Play/Activities


60% - Up and Around, but Minimal Active Play; Keeps Busy with Quieter Activities


70% - Both Greater Restriction of and Less Time Spent in Play Activity


80% - Active, but Tires More Quickly


90% - Minor Restrictions in Physically Strenuous Activity


100% - Fully Active, Normal

columns.name: UNOS_PHYSICAL_CAP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's physical capacity as reported to UNOS.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Limitations


Limited Mobility


Wheelchair Bound or More Limited


Not Applicable (<1 Year Old or Hospitalized)


Unknown

columns.name: UNOS_WORK_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is working for income.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown

columns.name: UNOS_WORK_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason why the patient is not working.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Disability


Demands of Treatment


Insurance Conflict


Inability to Find Work


Patient Choice - Homemaker


Patient Choice - Student Full Time/Part Time


Patient Choice - Retired


Patient Choice - Other


Not Applicable - Hospitalized


Unknown

columns.name: UNOS_WORK_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The level at which the patient is working, full time or part time, and why.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Working Full Time


Working Part Time Due to Demands of Treatment


Working Part Time Due to Disability


Working Part Time Due to Insurance Conflict


Working Part Time Due to Inability to Find Full Time Work


Working Part Time Due to Patient Choice


Working Part Time Reason Unknown


Working, Part Time vs. Full Time Unknown

columns.name: UNOS_ACAD_PROG_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's academic progress.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Within One Grade Level of Peers


Delayed Grade Level


Special Education


Not Applicable, too young for school/ High School graduate or GED


Unknown

columns.name: UNOS_ACAD_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's academic activity level.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Full Academic Load


Reduced Academic Load


Unable to Participate in Academics Due to Disease or Condition


Unable to Participate Regularly in Academics Due to Dialysis


Not Applicable, too young for school/ High School graduate or GED


Unknown

columns.name: UNOS_INSUR_PRI_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's primary type of insurance during the follow-up period.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Private Insurance


Public Insurance - Medicaid

Public Insurance - Medicare & Choice


Public Insurance - CHIP (Children's Health Insurance Program)


Public Insurance - Department of VA


Public Insurance - Other Government


Self


Donation


Free Care


Pending


Foreign Government, Specify


Public insurance - Medicare Unspecified


US/State Govt Agency


Unknown

columns.name: UNOS_ZIP
columns.description: The patient's ZIP Code.

columns.name: VOID_REASON
columns.description: The reason for voiding the record.

columns.name: UNOS_PREV_SURNAME
columns.description: Any surnames used by the patient, other than the surname recorded in the Name item.

columns.name: UNOS_PAT_IN_ZIP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is waiting in their permanent ZIP code.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNOS_WORK_C_NAME

columns.name: UNOS_CITIZEN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The candidate's citizenship status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


US Citizen


Resident Alien


Non-Resident Alien, Year Entered US


Non-US Citizen/US Resident


Non-US Citizen/Non-US Resident, Traveled to US for Reason Other Than Transplant


Non-US Citizen/Non-US Resident, Traveled to US for Transplant

columns.name: UNOS_ENTRY_USA_DT
columns.description: If the candidate is a Non-Resident Alien, the year the candidate entered the United States.

columns.name: UNOS_EDU_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The candidate's highest level of education.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None


Grade School (0-8)


High School (9-12) or GED


Attended College/Technical School


Associate/Bachelor Degree


Post-College Graduate Degree


N/A (Less Than 5 Years Old)


Unknown

 Category Entries:

Self


Donation


Free Care


None

columns.name: UNOS_OTIS_REGID
columns.description: The candidate's registry ID in OTIS, as supplied by UNOS.

columns.name: UNOS_LIST_ADD_DT
columns.description: The date the candidate was listed or added to the waitlist.

columns.name: UNOS_TXP_ADMIT_DT
columns.description: The date the recipient was admitted to the transplant center.  If the patient was admitted to the hospital before it was determined a transplant was needed, the date it was determined the patient needed a transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_TRSFR_PROV_NUM
columns.description: UNOS transfer provider number. This information is downloaded from UNOS.

columns.name: UNOS_TRANSFER_DT
columns.description: Transfer date. This information is downloaded from UNOS.

columns.name: HOME_ADDRESS
columns.description: The patient's street address.

columns.name: HOME_CITY
columns.description: The patient's home city.

columns.name: HOME_PHONE
columns.description: The patient's home phone number.

columns.name: WORK_PHONE
columns.description: The patient's work phone number.

columns.name: EMAIL
columns.description: The patient's e-mail address.

columns.name: UNOS_MARITAL_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's marital status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Single


Married


Divorced


Separated


Life Partner


Widowed


Unknown

columns.name: UNOS_LIV_DNR_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The relationship between the living donor and the recipient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Biological, Blood Related Parent


Biological, Blood Related Child


Biological, Blood Related Identical Twin


Biological, Blood Related Full Sibling


Biological, Blood Related Half Sibling


Biological, Blood Related Other Relative: Specify


Non-Biological, Spouse


Non-Biological, Life Partner


Non-Biological, Unrelated: Paired Donation


Non-Biological, Unrelated: Non-Directed Donation (Anonymous)


Non-Biological, Living/Deceased Donation


Non-Biological, Unrelated: Domino


Biological, Blood Related: Domino


Biological, Blood Related: Non-Domino Therapeutic Donor


Non-Biological, Unrelated: Non-Domino Therapeutic Donor


Non-Biological, Other Unrelated Directed Donation: Specify

columns.name: UNOS_LIV_DNR_TYP_SP
columns.description: Free text description of the relationship between the living donor and the recipient.

columns.name: DNR_INSURANCE_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the donor had health insurance at the time of donation.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNOS_WORK_C_NAME

columns.name: DNR_RECIPIENT_LNAME
columns.description: The recipient's last name in the living donor form.

columns.name: DNR_RECIPIENT_FNAME
columns.description: The recipient's first name in the living donor form.

columns.name: DNR_RECOV_CNTR_CODE
columns.description: The donor recovery facility center code.

columns.name: DNR_RECOV_CNTR_TYPE
columns.description: The donor recovery facility center type.

columns.name: DNR_WRKUP_CNTR_CODE
columns.description: The donor workup facility center code.

columns.name: DNR_WRKUP_CNTR_TYPE
columns.description: The donor workup facility center type.

columns.name: ORG_RCV_TXP_SAME_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the organ recovery and transplant occurred at the same center.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PRE_DONATN_HEIGHT
columns.description: The living donor's height (in centimeters) prior to donation.

columns.name: PRE_DONATN_HT_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies why the height of the living donor prior to donation is not available.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNOS_HEIGHT_STAT_C_NAME

columns.name: PRE_DONATN_WEIGHT
columns.description: The living donor's weight (in kilograms) prior to donation.

columns.name: PRE_DONATN_WT_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies why the weight of the living donor prior to donation is not available.

columns.description:
The status of the donor.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Living


Dead


Lost


Not Seen

columns.description: The attempts to collect donor status if unable to contact donor.

columns.description:
The most recent donor status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Living: Donor Seen at Transplant Center


Living: Donor Status Update by Verbal or Written Communication


Living: Donor Status Update by Other Health Care Facility


Living: Donor Status Update via Other Source (Example: recipient)

Dead

Not Seen

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SUPPORT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the candidate was on life support.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ORG_RCV_TXP_SAME_YN

Indicates whether the candidate was on continuous invasive ventilation.

 Category Entries: 


False


True

columns.description:
Indicates whether the candidate had an artificial liver.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNOS_LF_SPT_VENT_YN

columns.description:
Indicates whether the candidate was on other types of life support.
